resources:
Saot-Ilokano
// ----------------Labels---------------------- General Conversation Complimentary Phrases Basic Greetings People and Family Things Phrases for Dining Time and Date Direction and Places Accommodation Shopping Emergency Tourist and Attraction Numbers Learn Ilokano
// ------------------About us Strings------------------ About US
We are the Grade 12 ICT-MAWD(Mobile App and Web Development) students of STI College Laoag. We are the developers of the application called Saot-Ilokano. Our goal is to improve our service and give satisfaction to our customers.
Contact Us Email Phone
saotilokano@gmail.com
09282206760
Overview Saot-Ilokano is an easy to use mobile Ilokano Phrasebook that will give visitors to Ilocos Norte and those who are interested in learning Ilokano a good start in the language. Saot-Ilokano is recorded using native speaker and we have tried our best to be authentic in the pronunciation whilst ensuring it is easy to understand. Recommended app for tourist and business people visiting Ilocos Norte.
//-------------General Greeting WORDS--------------- //23 words
Yes
No
Do you understand?
I understand
Thank you
Please
I’m sorry
Please say that again
Can you speak slowly?
I’m good
I don’t know
You’re welcome.
That’s right
No problem
Who?
What?
How many?
How much?
Why?
Which?
Where?
When?
Wen
Saan
Naawatam? Natarusam?
Naawatak, Natarusak
Agyaman nak
Pangngaasim
Agpakawan nak, Pakawanen nak, Dispensaren nak
Ulitem man ti imbagam?
Ibaybayag mo man ti agsao?
Nasayaat nak met
Diak ammo
Awan ti aniaman na.
Pudno/Usto/Umno dayta
Awan ti problema
Sia-sino?
Ania?
Mano?
Sagmamano?
Apay?
Ania kadagitoy?
Sadino?
Caano?
//-------------Complimentary Phrases---------------- //15 words
You’re so fast.
Your voice is beautiful.
You’re smart
You’re strong.
You’re diligent
That color is perfect on you.
I like your hair.
I appreciate you.
You look beautiful.
You look handsome.
You’re polite.
You won.
Nagalisto ka.
Ti boses mo ket napintas.
Naglaing ka
Nagpisgsa ka
Nagaget ka
Dayta a maris ket perpekto kenka.
Magustwak dayta buok mo.
Apresyaren ka.
Napintas ka.
Nag taraki ka.
Nadayaw ka.
Nangabak ka.

//------------Phrases for Dining----------------
Let’s eat!
Have you eaten yet?
Yes, I just ate. Thanks!
Not yet.
Your food is so good!
Delicious!

I already ate.
Where do you want to eat?
Eat more.
Im done cooking now.
Mangan tayon!
Nangan kan?
Wen, nalpasen. Agyamanak!
Haan pay.
Nagimas ti sida yo!
Naimas!
Mabisinakon
Nanganakon
Ayana kayat mo panganan?
Mangan ka pay.
Nakaluto akon.

Policia
Sadino ti kaasigan nga estacion ti policia?
Sadino ti Ospital?
Tumawag ka iti mangngagas!
Tumawag ka iti ambulansya!
Mabalin nak a tulongan?
napukaw ko dagiti gam-gamit.

Pagdagusan
Naasideg
Adda ba wifi yo?

Nabatic tay tulbec iti uneg ti kwarto.
Adda nakareserba a kwartok.
Ania nga oras iti check out?
Addaan nak iti nasayaat nga panagtaeng, agyaman nak.
